divs: Sighting DetailsI watched a silvery stationary disc the size of a golf ball at the end of the Big Dipper for about 5 minutes at 3:15 a.m. 30 miles N.E. of Duluth MN. I was using the portable lou at the time.This was on Nov. 13 2012.This was at Bowman Lake.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Duluth
There were no other sightings in Duluth on or around November 13th 2012
Summary: At 3:15 a.m. 30 miles N.E. of Duluth on Bowman Lake I had to go outside of my camper to use my portable toilet. I looked up and this brilliant disc was at the end of the Big Dipper. It glowed of a silvery metalic substance. It was stationary.
